Name: Shirazu Yama
About the game: Gameplay - Follow the checkpoints and head for the goal in an environment where it's easy to lose your sense of direction. - Follow the lights of the stone lamp until they disappear. Keep walking straight in the direction they guided you to reach the next checkpoint. - If you bump into an enemy, drown in water, or it turns midnight, it's game over. Controls WASD / L-Stick　Movement Mouse movement / R-Stick　Camera Control Shift / R-Button + Movement　Sprint Space / Top action button　Jump Enter / Bottom action button / Left Click　Select, Interact Backspace / Right action button　Cancel Hold Right Click / L-Button　Lighter Interact with Rock/Stone lamp　Save Checkpoint M / Start　Pause Venturing too far, you find yourself alone and trapped, on a mountain half-submerged in water. It's a strange world where time shrinks and night keeps falling over the deep forest. Can you find your way out through the thick fog and all you will have to face behind it? All you have to do is walk straight. - One playthrough takes around 1-3 hours. - Hard mode: Shorter daytime and more interruptions make it even more easier to lose your way. Aim for a new high score and unlock all achievements! Warning This game contains elements that may scare you or cause anxiety. Please refrain from playing this game if frightening scenes would possibly make you feel unwell.
